about_the_game:
Farmistic is a top-down farming simulation game in early development by an independent developer.

Manage your farm

In Farmistic you'll be in charge of managing your farm. The fields need to be plowed, cultivated, drilled and harvested. The grain and corn has to be stored or sold, and the cycle repeats. Start small and get your hands dirty driving the tractors yourself. With your first profits, you can buy more and bigger machinery, and start automating the tasks.

Maybe you want to keep your farm small and comfy for a relaxing experience?
Or will you buy up all the land, let others do the work, and become the ultimate agricultural tycoon?

Farming

Fields need plowing, cultivating, drilling, fertilization, harvesting... a never ending duty! The dealership provides a range of small, medium and large tractors and different sizes of machinery for different fields. You'll need:
  • Tractors
  • Plows
  • Cultivators
  • Seed drills
  • Combine harvesters
  • Trailers
  • Mowers
  • Rakes
  • Balers

Animals

Your animals are going to be hungry! Cows will need hay and straw, chickens require grain. Don't forget the water and logistics to get it to your animals! If they are well taken care of, they reward you with milk and eggs, which can be sold for a nice profit.

Immersive mode

Get your hands dirty and drive/operate the machinery yourself in immersive mode. No need for others to do the work if you want the fun all for yourself!
